item.title: My workflow in learning Python
item.description: (Originally written in Day One on November 30th, 2015) When Apple introduced iBooks into Mac OS X a couple of releases ago, I thought it was a dumb idea. Reading eBooks was meant to be done on an e-ink reader, such as a Kindle, or worst case, an iPad or tablet with an LCD screen. Who would want to read books on their actual computer? It turns out, me. This may be big when it comes to learning Python.
